rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:54 PM, 28 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Batangas, Cavite, Rizal, Zambales, Tarlac, Nueva Ecija, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Pampanga and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Laguna(Nagcarlan, Rizal, Liliw, Majayjay) and Quezon(Dolores, Candelaria, Lucban, Tayabas, Sariaya) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
